message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_REFERENCE_FV_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Provider Reference Number must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ROLE_NAME_XFV_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: If Role is entered, then Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_NAME_ROLE_XFV_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: If Name is entered, then Role must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_USER_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: To Request Login Credentials for a Member, the Provider must be a registered user.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: The Provider/Provider Group with Reference Number %1s does not exist.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_MEMBER_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: The Provider Member with Reference Number %1s does not exist.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_MEMBER_ROLE_NAME_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: The Provider Member %1s of type %2s does not exist for this provider.

message.name: ERR_USERNAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The Username %1s already exists. Please enter a different Username, e.g. %2s.

message.name: ERR_EMAIL_ADDRESS_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: An email address must exist before you can create a user account.

message.name: ERR_USERNAME_REFERENCE_NUMBER_INCORRECT
message.locale: The Reference Number %1s or Username %2s cannot be found on the system.

message.name: ERR_USERNAME_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: The Username %1s does not exist. Please enter a valid Username.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_MUST_BE_APPROVED
message.locale: This Provider, %1s, is not Approved, login credentials cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUP_MUST_BE_ACTIVE
message.locale: The Provider Group, %1s, is not Active, login credentials cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The Provider, %1s, already has an active user account.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUP_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The Provider Group, %1s, already has an active user account.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_MEMBER_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The Member, %1s, already has an active user account.

message.name: TEXT_PROVIDERORGANIZATION_CREATE_INVOICE
message.locale: Create an Invoice

message.name: TEXT_PROVIDERORGANIZATION_GENERATE_ROSTER
message.locale: Generate a Roster

message.name: TEXT_PROVIDERORGANIZATION_MY_ACCOUNT
message.locale: My Account

message.name: TEXT_PROVIDERORGANIZATION_CHANGE_PASSWORD
message.locale: Change Password

message.name: ERR_EXTERNALUSER_FV_USERNAME_MUST_BE_LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO_30_CHARACTERS
message.locale: User Name must be less than or equal to 30 characters.

message.name: ERR_EXTERNALUSER_FV_USERNAME_MUST_BE_LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO_SIZE
message.locale: User Name must be less than or equal to %1s characters.
